name: move-windows
title: Move Windows
description: Move windows between desktops. Please set shortcuts for the actions to avoid unexpected errors.
author: albertxwz

commands.name: move-to-previous-desktop
commands.title: Move to Previous Desktop
commands.description: Move current window to previous desktop

commands.name: move-to-next-desktop
commands.title: Move to Next Desktop
commands.description: Move current window to next desktop

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
